review: Doctor is good. Expected better service. Only time will tell the outcome, but only superficial check with very limited info given regarding the discomfort.The excercises were to be shown by his assistants, who are totally laymen. They started showing shoulder exercise, on confronting, they informed us, they are not sure about it and tried to routed us to their known physiotherapy centre, and it was told, the activies prescribed will be shown by them only. I have faith on the doctor. But unhappy with the professionalism and service

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. A. N. Mukherjee is an experienced orthopedic surgeon. I was suffering from a soft tissue problem in my hand. He is checking me for last three months and I am feeling much better. Pain is much lesser than before. I am very happy with his treatment procedure.

Despite of booking through Practo I have been waiting more than 1 hour to enter in the doctor chamber, also staffs of that clinic are not efficient in managing the patients. We the patients are paying sum amount to get not only treatment but also proper explanation of the treatment and health issue and area of problems in future. *** ****** *** *** ******* *** ***** ****** ***** *** ***** ** **** ******* ***** *** **** ****** ******* *** ******** ********** ** **** I have asked to the receptionist for briefing about the prescribed medicines but they denied and told me that the same will ne answer by the doctor. Today on 28th Feb I have again visited the same place to consult with the diagnostic reports but it is very sad that doctor had not said anything about the reports of x-ray and other diagnosis. Overall I have paid ₹ 1000 but get nothing. **** ******* ** ****** Very dissatisfied with the overall treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited this doctor for my mother's neck pain related problem.
The doctor gave medication the effectiveness of which only time will tell. But the behavior of the doctor was rude and inappropriate. Also, did not give sufficient time to explain the problem and his diagnosis. Also, the doctor is not at all willing to spend time with patients. ****** ** ** * **** ********* ******* I would not advice or recommend this doctor for treatment. ***** **** ********* *********** **** **** ********* *** the laboratory was behind us following up  to do these blood tests. In short avoid this doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor examining patient while talking on phone, n response is terribly un professional. While patient looking towards his face , he still busy in his phn conversation n at the end he completed his examination without listening patient . No diagnosis made only pain killers .

My wife had ligament tear last year n we went to doctor Mukherjee. ** *** ********* ** *** ********* *** immediately put her on plaster and medicine.  Most of the doctor generally wait before putting the plaster. Due to this my wife was able to recover fast.

Amazing Dr and friendly too staff was also helpful. The way they manage everything was really good and helpfu even a new patient can get a good advice from the Dr and treatment too
and i recommend everyone do visit for your health issue they will take care of you for sure thanks practo

****** *** ** ****** * * ******* **** ***** ********** ******* *** *** ***** *** ***** * ****** *** ******** ****** *** **** *** ** ** **** * ****** They all are extremely rude. Clinic is very dirty. All the used cotton and other stuff were kept in reception area and trash was scattered all around. I don't think I will visit for 2nd consultation or ever again. Not at all recommende** **** ****** ** ** ** **** ********* ****** **** ******* **** *** ***** ** **** ***sh.

I had an overall good experience with Dr. Amitava, got relief from my lower back pain in just 15 days. The doctor is very precise in analysis and doesn't prescribe too many medicines for longer duration. I have also taken my father there who is being treated for Knee problem. I will recommend him for any orthopaedic problem to all my relatives and near ones.

The address of the doctor is not accurate neither the timings mentioned in the app. It took more than 40 mins for me to search the address after reaching to the location as per practo. Kindly update the location of the address.
Furthermore, the timings shown are 7 pm onwards, I called the clinic and they said doc sits from 3 pm and will leave at 7, so I had to rush to them because incorrect timings were shown.
The doctor was in hurry it seemed, while the 5 mins of consultation, ** *** **** ******* **** *** ******* *** more with his assistant and instructing her to call someone. He asked same thing 3 times as he was busy talking with the assistant and not listening to the patient.
I understand that the doctor had to go somewhere, *** ** **** *** **** **** **** ******** ****** ****** *** *** ******* *** ****** *** ******* **** *** *** **** ** ******* 
He was polite though.
